short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Logging utility for the Epilepsy Society to flag harmful media

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help to make the web a safer place for those with photosensitive epilepsy with unFlash.

unFlash is a content logging tool which allows you to quickly and easily log potentially seizure-inducing content on the web.

Currently supported platforms: Twitter
